thi-ap35:4.2: hitāya janataṃ bahuṃ → janatāya hitaṃ bahuṃ (bj); hitāya janataṃ sadā (sya1ed, sya2ed); hitāya janasaṃsariṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap35:11.3: Uppajji lokasaraṇo → vadataṃ varo (sya1ed, sya2ed); ca dīpavaro (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap35:11.4: araṇo amataṅgato → sabbasattānamuttamo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
